A Cochrane review on community-based intervention packages for preventing maternal and 
newborn illness and death offers encouraging evidence of the value of integrating maternal 
and newborn care in community settings through a range of strategies, many of which can be 
packaged effectively for delivery through a range of community health workers (CHWs) ( 3).
